prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Synth Pad, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Synth Pad, and Piano are all featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Synth Pad, and Piano, but no Drums.
